name: Cool Dunk Party
description:
The Game:

It's a two player dunking competition!

Left player tries to get the orange square ball to touch the orange rectangle  hoop.  It only counts if you hit the hoop from the top just like in real life basketball!

Right player tries to hit the ball with their arm to knock the ball away.

Sides switch after three rounds, game ends when one player scores 3 points. 

Controls:

Blue player uses Q and Z keys. 

Q and Z also control the mode menu,. Enter selects an option.

Red player uses , and P keys

Offensive: Q / , jumps straight up, Z / P in the air dives forward, Z / P on the ground does a short hop backwards

Defense: Q / , also jumps straight up, Q / , in the air dives backward, Z / P on the ground jumps forward, Z / P in the air fast falls straight down

Escape pauses the game!

Modes:

Basic modes use one consistent court.

Party modes changes courts randomly after each round.

Cool modes are just cooler than noncool modes.

The Mac App:

I have absolutely no idea if that works or how it would work if it does work. Macs are completely alien to me.

Credits:

all of the music: Tyler O'Neill

everything else: me
